gw.plugin.apiextensionbundles.ApiExtensionBundlesRestConfigSourcePlugin

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getAccessHandlerSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns the source of the given access handler configuration, if the plugin manages the handler, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a handler with that name
    String
    getApiConfigSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns the source of the given api config, if the plugin manages that api config, and null if this plugin instance does not produce any api config with that name.
    String
    getFilterSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns the source of the given integration filter, if the plugin manages that filter, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a filter with that name.
    String
    getJsonSchemaSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns the source of the given JSON Schema, if the plugin manages that schema, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a schema with that name.
    String
    getMappingSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns the source of the given integration mapping, if the plugin manages that mapping, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a mapping with that name.
    String
    getPublishedApisAdditions()
    Returns configuration source in the same format as published-apis.yaml, which will be merged with the published-apis.yaml file in the configuration folder, or null if this plugin does not wish to publish any additional APIs.
    String
    getSwaggerSchemaSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns the source of the given Swagger schema, if the plugin manages that schema, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a schema with that name.
    String
    getUpdaterSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns the source of the given updater file, if the plugin manages that updater, and null if this plugin instance does not produce an updater with that name.
    boolean
    hasAccessHandlerSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns true if this plugin will produce an access handler file with the given name, and false otherwise.
    boolean
    hasApiConfigSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns true if this plugin will produce an api configuration file with the given name, and false otherwise
    boolean
    hasSwaggerSchemaSource(String fullyQualifiedName)
    Returns true if this plugin will produce a swagger schema with the given name, and false otherwise
    void
    registerChangeCallback(ConfigSourceChangeCallback callback)
    Registers a callback that can be used by the plugin to indicate that configuration sources have changed and the caches should be reloaded.

      public String getPublishedApisAdditions()
      Description copied from interface: IIntegrationConfigSourcePlugin
      Returns configuration source in the same format as published-apis.yaml, which will be merged with the published-apis.yaml file in the configuration folder, or null if this plugin does not wish to publish any additional APIs.
      Specified by:
      getPublishedApisAdditions in interface IIntegrationConfigSourcePlugin
      Returns:
      the source for additional published-apis configuration, or null

    • registerChangeCallback

      public void registerChangeCallback(ConfigSourceChangeCallback callback)
      Description copied from interface: IIntegrationConfigSourcePlugin
      Registers a callback that can be used by the plugin to indicate that configuration sources have changed and the caches should be reloaded. Currently, reloading of schemas is only triggered by REST API requests, and only when the server is running in "dev" mode (i.e. -Dgw.server.mode=dev).
      Specified by:
      registerChangeCallback in interface IIntegrationConfigSourcePlugin
      Parameters:
      callback - the callback to invoke when configuration sources have changed
